examples: wc?class MATH 135: Get information about MATH 135
wc?class MATH 135 -page 2: Get second page of classes for MATH 135
wc?class MATH 135 -term 1215: Get information about MATH 135 in Spring 2021 (which has termcode 1215)
wc?class MATH 135 -class 6067: Get information about class with number 6067 for MATH 135

history.desc: Get information about when a course was last offered
examples: wc?history MATH 135: Get information on when MATH 135 was last offered
wc?history MATH 135 -page 2: Get second page of when MATH 135 was offered
